name: Dark Chapter: Alien Breeder
description:
Dark Chapter: Alien Breeder is an exploration / combat game with an old school twist : you may be in a situation where you are already dead, but don’t know it yet.

Resources like ammunition, regents are important, there is not a lot of them around, so better be very caution with it.

Fight are dangerous, if you can avoid them, it’s better. You have multiple way to avoid them, like hiding, using some smell disguise …  

If you see an enemy, the color of the name may give you an hint on how they’ll behave toward you. Their name is also important.

There is a Discord server where you can react Discord Server
